Package javax.comm

Interface Summary
CommDriver Part of the loadable device driver interface.
CommPortOwnershipListener Propagates various communications port ownership events.
ParallelPortEventListener Propagates parallel port events.
SerialPortEventListener Propagates serial port events.
 

Class Summary
CommApiVersion This class tracks the version number of the API implementation
CommPort A communications port.
CommPortIdentifier Communications port management.
ParallelPort A parallel communications port.
ParallelPortEvent A parallel port event.
SerialPort An RS-232 serial communications port.
SerialPortEvent A serial port event.
 

Exception Summary
NoSuchPortException Thrown when a driver can't find the specified port.
PortInUseException Thrown when the specified port is in use.
UnsupportedCommOperationException Thrown when a driver doesn't allow the specified operation.
